posts.content:
As already stated this is for MEMBERS ONLY. New memberships and renewals can be arranged on arrival.
At present we have in excess of 25 vans so don't leave it too late to book in.
Arrival is from Friday, demonstrations will run through Saturday and Sunday morning. These wil consist so far of full engine service inc brakes, king pin rebuild, underbody/chassis treatment and carb tuning and electrics.
Valuations of individuals vans can be arranged, THESE MUST BE PRE BOOKED.
Evenings will be low key socials in the barn (bring your own drink). Toilets and showers on site.
Cost is £20 per unit for the weekend.
Book in by ringing me on 01455 208270 or by PM ing.
Please note this is a hands on weekend with experts to help and advise on most aspects of running your van.
Don't forget the clubs spares trailer will be on hand for all those bits you might need.
For those who want breakfasts will be available in the farm house dining room at a cost of £5 but must be pre booked on arrival
Eddy
ps, what could be better, lying on your back in the grass with a bus on top of you !!!!!!!!!!!

Glad you're doing the memberships there, I keep forgetting to send our things off! Can we book breakfast for 4 on Sunday morning too?

Absolutely can't wait to come down, our first time out with the camper!! Eeeeekkk!!
Gerry and I will be attending .... arriving Saturday morning
can we just turn up for a nose about for a few hour in the day ?
No probs Ade be good to see you
eddy wrote:No probs Ade be good to see you
Did you get my PM Eddy, any idea for a time slot on the valuation?

Seedlings Splittie Scalextrics Competition - copied from other post:


Well, we've now received 3 entries with a further one promised in the post. Thanks!

There is still time to send your entry - anything that arrives by the beginning of next week will be counted - if you're a bit worried it might not make it then just let us know it's coming.
Matthew will be at the technical weekend and will hopefully have a few templates with him so you can either complete one there or drop off the ones you've already done.

Looking forward to some more works of art over the weekend.

Amanda

Can I take this opportunity to thank Jackie for having us this weekend, what a great weekend it turned out to be, nice crowd all willing to have a chat, some we new, some we didn't , and the Saturday night get together was a wizz, brilliant as I heard some gentleman say.
We both hope you will consider this again in the future, please.....
On a more worrying note, there seemed to be an older guy there most of the time too wondering about and while we found this strange, he seemed friendly enough, some times we found him hanging around our van looking sorry for himself so we offered him tea and coffee which he gladly excepted, bless him, smoked a lot too......mmmmm bad habit me thinks!

Ah well, glad to be home munching on our left over cake.

What happened to the older guy........will have to wait and see!!!

Nice to meet you all
Ron & Ang

I had a great time Saturday night was great. First time I had slept in a split for 8 years......

It was great to meet up with friends old and new

Next year please.

Cheers

Miles.

To add my thanks to Eddy, Jackie and everyone else that made this a really great weekend.

I learnt so much, met a load of friendly people and the sun shone, brilliant!

I now wish I stayed a member whilst my van was off the road, but membership now renewed and looking forward to meeting up with more members

Thanks again

Jeff
(Yellow bus)

What a great weekend. I could say loads about the people, weather, vans etc but instead I will just say a Huge THANK YOU to all those involved in making it a very interesting and enjoyable weekend for Matthew and I.
Does anyone know the contact details for Peter Banks aka SHABBA as I understand he calibrates speedometers, and I am in need of his services..... Thanks

He can be found in the members section, just send him a PM. Great Guy top notch work
Kate
